snippet: Myanmar’s government has arrested dozens of people in connection with an outbreak of sectarian violence in the country’s center last month.
abstract: Myanmar's government arrests dozens of people in connection with anti-Muslim protests by Buddhists and some will go on trial within days.
lead_paragraph: Myanmar’s government has arrested dozens of people in connection with an outbreak of sectarian violence in the country’s center last month.

headline.seo: Myanmar: Dozens Arrested in Investigation of Riots
headline.main: Myanmar: Dozens Arrested in Investigation of Riots
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Dozens Arrested in Investigation of Riots
